amendment.description: Amendment sought to delay the increase in flood insurance premiums in New Jersey and New York until the end of FY 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to carry out the amendments made by section 100207 of the Biggert-Waters Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2012 (title II of division F of Public Law 112-141) with respect to any property located in the State of New Jersey or the State of New York.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 278 (Roll no. 206).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 278 (Roll no. 206).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Runyan.
